name: Fel Taradiddle
flavor_text: It's an unassuming thing, but you'll be amazed at the damage it can do when applied with precision.

frame.name: Lightweight Frame
frame.description:
Recurve Bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped. 
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

perks.description:
Durable yet light bowstring.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Agile Bowstring

perks.description:
Stable, high-friction bowstring.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Tactile String

perks.description:
Excellent snapback.
  •  Decreases accuracy
  •  Faster draw time
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Elastic String

perks.description:
Light and easy to draw.
  •  Slightly faster draw time
  •  Slightly decreases accuracy
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Flexible String

perks.description:
Tightly strung bow.
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly slower draw time
  •  Slightly decreases stability
perks.name: High Tension String

perks.description:
Simple balanced string.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Natural String

perks.description:
Unbreakable bowstring.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly faster draw time
perks.name: Polymer String

perks.description:
Light and stable shaft material. 
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Carbon Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Thinner arrows to increase nocking speed and weapon handling.
  •  Increases handling speed 
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: Compact Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Heavy and consistent. 
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly decreases stability
perks.name: Fiberglass Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Aerodynamic and light. 
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Helical Fletching

perks.description:
Feather-light with good control.
  •  Slightly decreases accuracy
  •  Greatly increases stability
perks.name: Natural Fletching

perks.description:
Modern fletching for straight paths. 
  •  Increases accuracy
perks.name: Straight Fletching

perks.description: Shooting an ammo brick picks it up and automatically reloads all of your equipped weapons from reserves.
perks.name: Shoot to Loot

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for a moderate duration.
perks.name: Stats for All

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: Shooting an ammo brick picks it up and automatically reloads all of your equipped weapons from reserves. Increases range.
perks.name: Shoot to Loot

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for an improved duration.
perks.name: Stats for All

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for an improved duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.
perks.name: Rangefinder

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion

perks.description: Draw time decreases after every precision hit.
perks.name: Archer's Tempo

perks.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification, and improves handling. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.
perks.name: Rangefinder

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion for a short duration.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion Enhanced

perks.description: Draw time substantially decreases after every precision hit for a longer duration.
perks.name: Archer's Tempo

perks.description: Faster charge time or draw time when surrounded by combatants.
perks.name: Cornered

perks.description: Arrows explode after a short delay.
perks.name: Explosive Head

perks.description: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: Faster charge time or draw time when surrounded by combatants. Improves stability.
perks.name: Cornered

perks.description: Arrows explode after a short delay. Increases accuracy.
perks.name: Explosive Head

perks.description: Defeating combatants with this weapon generates an improved small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon.
perks.name: Adrenaline Junkie

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.
perks.name: One for All

perks.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed.
perks.name: Successful Warm-Up

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon for an improved duration.
perks.name: Adrenaline Junkie

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for an improved duration.
perks.name: One for All

perks.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed for an improved duration.
perks.name: Successful Warm-Up

perks.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.
perks.name: Psychohack
